title: Damaged
description: Cops, security guards, correctional officers. Theyâ€™re more than sexy men in uniforms. They have lives, they fall in love, they fight and they deal with dangerous situations. These are their stories.Book two in the Uniformity seriesCorrectional Officer Zane Davis didn't think commitment was in the cards but when he meets Brett Emerson everything that once seemed impossible is now all he can think about.Correctional Officer Zane Davis thought being bi-sexual and afraid of commitment meant he was destined to be alone until he meets someone who changes everything.There is an instant attraction when Zane meets Brett Emerson on the job. The fact that Brett is engaged to a woman doesn't dampen Zane's attraction. Brett and Zane become friends as they also work to uncover corruption at the prison. The friendship deepens and turns to romance, but will Zane survive the danger he puts himself in when he finds out how far up the corruption goes?Ethan StoneEthan Stone has recently returned to Oregon and is working on re-growing his web feet. He has been obsessed with two things in his books and all things gay. After spending years trying to ignore the voices in his head, he finally decided to sit down and listen to them.
author: Ethan Stone
